section.title: Introduction
section.para:
Beer3 is a next-generation templating engine which was engineered with several goals in mind:
Simplicity
Flexibility
Extensibility
Ease of use

This templating engine should not be bloated, instead, we try to do it "The Zen Way" - you do not need to learn too many things, thus you can concentrate getting your things done, while the template engine does the rest.

section.title: What does it do?
section.para: In the current MVC system of FLOW3, the View part is currently quite low-level. That means, the standard view provides a render method, and nothing more. That makes it really difficult to write powerful views, as most designers will not write PHP code.

That is where the Template Engine comes into play: It "lives" inside the View, and is controlled by a special TemplateView which instanciates the Template Parser, resolves the template HTML file, etc.
